{"id":973800959,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 week, 3 days","timestamp":1687062507,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"303 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/973800959/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Special Permutations","memory":"54.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n int[][] dp;\n\n    public int solve(int[] nums, int hehe, int i, int maski) {\n        if (i == nums.length) {\n            return 1;\n        }\n        if (dp[hehe + 1][maski] != -1) {\n            return dp[hehe + 1][maski];\n        }\n        int tot = 0;\n        for (int j = 0; j < nums.length; j++) {\n            if ((maski & (1 << j)) != 0) {\n                continue;\n            }\n            if (hehe == -1 || nums[hehe] % nums[j] == 0 || nums[j] % nums[hehe] == 0) {\n                tot += solve(nums, j, i + 1, maski | (1 << j));\n            }\n            tot %= 1000000007;\n        }\n        dp[hehe + 1][maski] = tot;\n        return dp[hehe+ 1][maski];\n    }\n\n    public int specialPerm(int[] nums) {\n        dp = new int[20][(1 << 14) ];\n        for (int[] row : dp) {\n            Arrays.fill(row, -1);\n        }\n        return solve(nums, -1, 0, 0);\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"special-permutations","has_notes":false}
